SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.net

Class RmiAccepter

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.net.RmiAccepter
All Implemented Interfaces:
RmiAccepterInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class RmiAccepter extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RmiAccepterInterface
The RmiAccepter class is responsible for accepting RMI client connections and registering them with the server. It implements the RmiAccepterInterface and extends UnicastRemoteObject to enable remote method invocation.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

  • Constructor Details

    • RmiAccepter

      public RmiAccepter(OnServerConnectionLostListener onServerConnectionLostListener, ServerDispatcher serverDispatcher) throws RemoteException
      Constructs a RmiAccepter object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      onServerConnectionLostListener - the listener to notify when a server connection is lost.
      serverDispatcher - the server dispatcher to handle incoming RMI client requests.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote exception occurs during object export.

  • Method Details

    • registerClient

      public RmiServerInterface registerClient(RmiClientInterface clientSocket) throws RemoteException
      Registers the RMI client with the server by creating the necessary adapter and server instances. Additionally, a server heartbeater thread is started to monitor the client's connection status.
      Specified by:
      registerClient in interface RmiAccepterInterface
      Parameters:
      clientSocket - the RMI client interface object to register.
      Returns:
      the RMI server interface object to be used by the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote exception occurs during RMI operation.
